summary: A diffusion pipeline that integrates Stable Diffusion components (VAE, CLIP text encoder, tokenizer, conditional UNet, scheduler, safety checker) with region‑aware prompting logic. It parses a configuration dictionary to split the canvas into columns/rows or apply distinct prompts per region, optionally saving generated masks, and produces text‑conditioned images with localized control.
business_intent: Enable enterprises and creators to generate customized images where specific areas are guided by separate textual cues, supporting use cases such as targeted advertising visuals, product mockups, personalized graphics, and any workflow that requires fine‑grained control over generated content.
